home.content:
# Welcome, FEWD113 --- Here are the main class resources for today. #### [Checking-in](https://fewd113.slack.com/messages/general/) So **on SLACK**: /checkin **`[YOUR_FULL_NAME]`** #### [Homework Submission](https://fewd113.slack.com/messages/general/) So **on Slack**: /homework **`[YOUR_GITHUB_PAGES_URL]`** #### [Lecture 2 Class Notes](https://fewdmaterials.github.io/FEWD113_Lecture2/#home) Today's class notes. #### [Homework 1](https://fewdmaterials.github.io/FEWD113_Homework1/) Due **Thursday** 11/10 at 6PM #### [Gitbot](http://gitbot.co) For submitting homework / deploying your work to the internets #### [Live class notes](http://autosync.io/#/course/Taq/0) Code that we write in class will be synced live to [Autosync](http://autosync.io/#/course/Taq/0). #### [Livestream](https://mottaquikarim.github.io/livestream/) **Introducing**: Live streaming class links and resources #### [Exit Tickets](https://goo.gl/forms/CNIdKhiXxYD0BMIJ3) Help us get better at helping you! Please fill our this exit ticket after class each night to help us understand how we can improve our lecture game. #### [Important Class Information](https://fewdmaterials.github.io/FEWD113/) This is the Source of Truth for our class. ---
## JavaScript Practice List Here's a running list of all the javascript practice problems posted in between classes. #### [DOM problem 1](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_1) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_1)

#### [DOM problem 2](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_2) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_2)

#### [DOM problem 3](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_3) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_3)

#### [JavaScript Functions Practice](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/Functions_Practice) Feel free to complete **P2.js** to **P8.js** on this page. If you're feeling gutsy, try **P9** and **P10**, however they will require some research! #### [JavaScript Functions Practice 2](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_JavaScript_Basics_PSET) Five more problems for you to work on. #### [Problems 1-8: The Basics](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_1) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_1) **PURPOSE**: basic review, finger warmers.

#### [Problems 9-16: The Basics](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_2) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_2) **PURPOSE**: more challenging, use of conditionals and random number generators.

#### [Problems 17-24: Conditionals](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_3) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_3) **PURPOSE**: Conditional based problems, ups the level once more

#### [Problem 25: Calculate Grade](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/Calculate_Grade) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/Calculate_Grade) **PURPOSE**: DOM based conditional problem

#### [Problems 26-30: Random](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_4) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_4) **PURPOSE**: DOM based conditional problem

#### [Problems 31-34: Slideshow](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_6) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_6) **PURPOSE**: DOM based slideshow problem

#### [Problems 35-46: Loops](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_8) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_8) **PURPOSE**: Loops practice #### [Problems 47-50: Objects](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_9) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_9) #### [Problems 51-60: Objects II](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_10) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_10)
